#summary Presentations about SymPy

= Introduction =

On this page you can find all presentations about !SymPy that were given at conferences.

== !SciPy 2007 ==

[http://www.scipy.org/SciPy2007/ SciPy2007] was a conference at Caltech (Los Angeles, USA), where Ondřej gave this talk: [http://sympy.googlecode.com/svn/materials/presentations/scipy2007.pdf scipy2007.pdf]
 
== SAGE Days 6 ==

[http://wiki.sagemath.org/days6/ SAGE Days 6] was a conference in Bristol (UK) where Ondřej gave this talk: [http://hg.certik.cz/SD6/raw-file/2c1aefebf157/pres.pdf pres.pdf]
